homework4

Class Panel

  • java.lang.Object
    • homework4.Panel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class Panel
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    A Panel is one of 25 square panels of Billboard. A typical Panel consists of a set of properties: {color, size}. Panel color is changeable and Panel size is unchangeable. Panel observes at all time on ColorGenerator and update is color according to the generator.
